children.value: Knolx Portal, an in-house project, facilitates automation of processes required to organize Knolx sessions and Meetups. These processes include scheduling sessions, capturing feedback and providing analytics for identifying key performance indicators. Knolx session is a knowledge sharing session wherein all Knolders meet at a point of time for a period of 45 minutes to 60 minutes once every week during which one of the Knolders presents on a technology to either introduce it to other Knolders or to discuss its pros and cons. Responsibilities included: - Developing the back end of the project using Play framework on Scala. - Developing the front end of the project using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and Bootstrap. - Making the website responsive for mobile devices.
